titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt sports betting from the tax on authorized wagers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/31/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit the imposition of a tax on any wager on a sporting event if that wager is authorized under the law of the state in which it is accepted.
